title: Anyone know what this handwritten script type font is or have similar recommendations?
content:
Hi,

I have a strong suspicion that this is a custom/modified font, but does anyone have any clue as to what font it was based on? Or alternatively, if you know of anything similar?

Any help would be appreciated muchly! Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830131121im_/http:/typophile.com/files/estrella-damm-verano-2013-mediterraneamente_4170.jpg)
author: adechong

comments.content:
This looks like a custom logo/lettering (not a font).  
See the 4 different "e" the 2 different "T, 2 different "a", etc
Hi fvilanakis, I thought so… do you happen to know any similar fonts though?

Somewhat similar to:  
Filmotype Havana  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/havana/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830131121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/havana/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/havana/")  
Signalist  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mika-melvas/signalist/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830131121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mika-melvas/signalist/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mika-melvas/signalist/")  
Arbor Brush  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/grouptype/arbor-brush/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830131121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/grouptype/arbor-brush/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/grouptype/arbor-brush/")  
choc  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search/choc/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830131121/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/choc/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/choc/fonts/")  
Ember  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/ember/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830131121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/ember/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/ember/")  
Don
